txt.en:
It is clear to your travel-wary eyes that this is no ordinary tree. This is an Ent!

He is strangely silent compared to others that you have seen. His eyes are sleepy, but he holds your own eyes with a searching green depth.

You gaze bemused at this quiet creature's eyes, and soon strange thoughts begin to seep into your mind.

You believe you understand what just happened: you were given a memory from deep within the eyes of the Ent, something he saw that he wants to know about.\n\nThis Ent has grown too sleepy, too tree-ish to solve the riddle of this memory. Will you help him?
You have the sensation of recalling a memory that is not your own....
You have happened upon an Ent in the Eaves of Fangorn, a foreboding forest on the edge of Rohan.
See what can be seen in the depths of the Ent's gaze
The sleepy Ent is along the faint path at the southern edge of Fangorn Forest.\n\nYou should speak with Ashlimb.
The sleepy Ent is along the faint path at the southern edge of Fangorn Forest.\n\nYou should speak with Ashlimb.
